A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Don't believe the trolls -- this is an excellent movie. I've been a gigantic Star Wars fans since I saw the first movie at the drive-in when I was three years old. It's exciting\, unpredictable\, fun\, touching. There are some great action scenes. Adam Driver delivers a powerful performance as Kylo Ren. Everyone who is worried about questions that are still hanging out there -- there is another movie coming. It's going to be okay. I'm excited to see this again and again and to take my kids to see it.
